name: Deserted (itch) (MashyZ)
description:
Made for the SCREAM JAM 2021 in 10 days

A short horror survival where you control a young alien who has to try and survive from a predator trying to find it.

Survive for 4 days to win.

Find augments to better upgrade your character - or perhaps make the game more challenging.
'WSAD' to move.

'Left Shift' to run.

'E' to open your augment menu.

Crafting augments require materials. Get these materials by mining them.

Once you have the enough, you can craft it. Not all augments are good - think wisely.

Watch out for traps that will spawn on day 2 and day 3.

Good luck!
